website_summaries.verdict: If you thought all potato peelers were created equal, wielding this unstoppable tool will be a revelation.
pros: Ultra sharp swiveling serrated blade effortlessly peels just about any fruit or vegetable
If you have a large family, the ergonomic handle makes peeling industrial quantities a breeze, and the robust construction will see you through years of heavy-duty use
Features a built-in potato eye remover

customer_reviews.title: I wish that the blades were replaceable.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd OXO peeler. It's a great ergonomic design but the blades begin to dull after about 2 years. I can extend the life a few more months by honing them with a knife steel but they need to be replaced soon. I wish that OXO would sell the blades instead of having to throw away the handle to get a new edge. I understand the concept of planned obsolescence, but we shouldn't be filling landfills with plastic just so they can make a few bucks on a new peeler.
customer_reviews.author: Epistem

customer_reviews.title: I finally used this one today and (aside from adding a chunk of knuckle to the beef stew) it was a great experience! I paid five bucks for one at ...
customer_reviews.text: We certainly have lost some pizzazz in our lives when reviewing a potato peeler is the highlight of a day, but WOW! I finally used this one today and (aside from adding a chunk of knuckle to the beef stew) it was a great experience! I paid five bucks for one at the grocery store a few months ago to replace the peeler I'd had half my life and couldn't get used to peeling toward my belly. It was so dull it wouldn't have done much damage anyway, but this one by OXO is like finding a long-lost friend! It WORKS! It peels away in long neat strips! Yay for new potato peelers!
customer_reviews.author: Jayne P.

customer_reviews.title: Peels hard vegetables easily
customer_reviews.text: OXO products always good - this peeler included. I tried to peel 7 big yams at Christmas (with a friend's peeler) and it took forever. That prompted me to buy an OXO peeler, and give it a try. It's a world of difference. So is their kettle, their scrubbers, their sink grates, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Bentley's Folks

customer_reviews.title: Very dangerous peeling tool to use, cut off a chunk of my fingernail AND my finger
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this but after having my left hand left in a bloody mess and in pain all day I'm very disappointed to say the least. Dangerous peeling tool to use, the peeler slipped, cut straight through my fingernail and then cut out a chunk of my middle finger. Now I have over 20 apples, oranges and potatoes that I have to be afraid to peel in fear of the peeler slipping an cutting apart another part of my body. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Curvy Veggies and Jicima are no problem for this Peeler. Good Value and Strong Performer
customer_reviews.text: This is really no different than any other high grade or useful peeler. With that being said the one major difference is that this PEELER WORKS WELL ON IRREGULAR vegetables. What I mean is that those hard to peel curvy sweet potatoes. This peeler carves them up easily. Also I used it on a Jicama where other peelers have failed and this one did its bes to peel through. In the end it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: GchanMako

customer_reviews.title: Peel Lightly, Quickly, Easily
customer_reviews.text: It's so smooth and easy to hold. Just the way a peeler should be. Treated a pound of sweat potatoes like butter Update: I use it all the time and it's still working great. Added a picture of peeling carrots. The head tilts to meet the produce similar to how a razor would curve on a face. Comes with a protective cover. The peeler is dishwasher safe. I would not put the cover in the dishwasher due to its size. I leave the cover in the drawer so it doesn't need to be cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great peeler
customer_reviews.text: Best peeler I have ever owned .I have to get use to not using so much effort in peeling or shredding .The blade is very sharp , the first couple times I used the peeler I cut my fingers .I have many other kitchen tools by oxo and always good products .Don't hesitate on this one , spend the extra couple dollars you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: susan johnson

customer_reviews.title: Risk!
customer_reviews.text: This peeler is a risk. This arrived yesterday, and I am yet to use it. It was in my drawer today when I grabbed another item. The protective case is flimsy and had already fallen off. The peeler cut my finger fairly deep. I am not clumsy. I cook a lot and have never cut myself like this. I’m sure it is a great peeler, as it is extremely sharp. I only wish it had a better protective case. I threw the item away as it is a risk. It is not worth shipping it back for a refund at that price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R. Jourdan

customer_reviews.title: NO RETURN POLICY
customer_reviews.text: I am very frustrated. this peeler is very uncomfortable to use. I peeled 4 potatoes last night and I couldn't even hold it any longer, it started hurting my hand. Here is the best part, I wanted to return it back, so I can purchase a different one. OOPS. You cannot return it. What a scam!
customer_reviews.author: OF

customer_reviews.title: Easy to cut yourself with
customer_reviews.text: The second potato I peeled with it I about cut the tip of my finger off. The movement in the blade makes it hard to control and the potato skins tend to stick to it
customer_reviews.author: Danny Koon

customer_reviews.title: I prefer the smaller version.
customer_reviews.text: For me this version of OXO Good Peeler is good with wide shape fruit like apple. But it is not good for a narrow shape like carrot, because the blade can peel your skin off the finger holding that carrot. The blade is kind of big. Good thing about this version is the handle is really comfortable. But I prefer the smaller version that can be good with any fruit shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Tarn Manicha

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend! Potato peeling heaven
customer_reviews.text: I love the sharpness of the peeler, peels easily and has a little eye corer thing at the end which is nice. The older version had a smaller handle so making it thicker is a bit of a difference when comparing it. My hands are a bit on the smaller side so it makes the handles more difficult to hold and they get tired after a while but my brothers who have larger hands prefer this size handle compared to the older one. The main part is that the blades are super sharp, potato peeling is super easy now!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian c.

customer_reviews.title: Like it more every day
customer_reviews.text: It took me a few tries to really be efficient with this when I first received. The way it swivels was different than what I had before. After using it a few times, my husband and I both love it. The swivel glides along the potato, apple, or whatever you are peeling. It has a sharp blade, peeling a thin layer with ease, yet your fingers are protected. It has a safety plastic covering if you chose to keep that for storage. I highly recommend this vegetable peeler. It is by far the best I have ever used, and until using this I never realized how difficult the others were. Great price and should last for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Dangerously Sharp - BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Cut myself badly twice using this very sharp peeler. The old one my mother had did the job but would not cut a person. Very unhappy. Too late to return it, will throw it away and buy the old-fashion one from etsy or ebay. Contacted OXO to see if they can tell me how to dull the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Rusts easily
customer_reviews.text: Rust on the inside of the blades after just a few months of use
customer_reviews.author: Lak

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY - Low Quality and Amazon will not accept Return
customer_reviews.text: not impressed with the quality, so I tried to return. this was declined by AMAZON. so I figured ok, we will try to use it, it doesn't peel very well, So I tried to return again and the return was denied again. This is a low quality $10 piece of junk. I don't know why this is not eligible for a refund, but don't waste your money. Really disappointed in Amazon on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This is really IMO
customer_reviews.text: This really is, IMO, a TERRIFIC peeler! It's sharp as a razor and, even though I don't do all the fancy-schmancy television techniques, it's still, by far, the best peeler I've ever used. (I can get only so frenzied about peeling vegetables, to be perfectly honest...) Let me add that I take one along whenever I'm going to stay somewhere with a kitchen I'm expected to utilize (along with a good chef's knife, some parchment paper, and an egg timer). I accidentally left one at a condo rental a few months ago, and immediately ordered a replacement. I have two at home, and use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L

customer_reviews.title: It's nice looking and plenty sharp
customer_reviews.text: It's nice looking and plenty sharp, but I prefer my old fashioned peeler that is similarly built w/o the heavy handle and other black framing around the peeler part. I think that this item would be good for someone with carpal tunnel or other problems with wrist pain.
customer_reviews.author: Shang

customer_reviews.title: Terrible at its job!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this peeler because it looked similar to a peeler I used to have that went missing (I think my son absconded with it)! Unfortunately, the peeler I had was rigid and very easy to use; this one moves and will not reliably remove the skin on any vegetable or fruit that I have tried it on! I am superbly disappointed in this purchase and will likely have to look around for a more suitable replacement for the good peeler I used to have. I would not recommend this peeler - way too frustrating to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: OXO Good Grips peeler is very comfortable to use and peels perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I really love this peeler and I wish I had purchased it sooner. This is a very comfortable peeler for hands that have rheumatoid arthritis and it peels perfectly. I use it for vegetables and to zest lemons. It peels the outer layer of the lemon perfectly but does not peel the white pith. This peeler works great on carrots, zucchini, cucumbers, ginger root, turmeric root. It doesn't waste any of the vegetable, it just removes the skin, in one pass, perfectly every single time.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowchaser

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes - big is just too big
customer_reviews.text: You know - sometimes a bigger handle is just too big. Also, the peelings do not fall off as well as others we have used and tends to clog up the blade frequently. Strike this one up as an emergency backup if we loose our primary peeler again...
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: VERY sharp- keep the cover !!
customer_reviews.text: This thing could remove the gonads from a fruit fly, and leave the rest intact. It removes a thin layer of produce skin very completely on beets and parsnips (only things I've peeled so far). No real waste of the rest of the produce. But keep the blade cover. I found out that just picking the thing up out of my gizmo bowl by the sink that this is gonna win any war with fingers. I'm glad I got two. I'm going through a veggie bender, and this is really, really good to have.
customer_reviews.author: J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: For effortless peeling
customer_reviews.text: The swiveling twin blades on the peeler are quite sharp and effective which results in you peeling potatoes or other fruits and vegetables with ease. When I used it for the first time, I was quite surprised at how it needs next to no pressure when peeling. The construction is sturdy and the handle has good grip. The handle is oversized as described and requires some getting used to. It's also soft and it gets scratched easily. Even fingernails leave behind marks on the rubber. In the long run, the handle will reveal the peeler's age.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav Joshi

customer_reviews.title: Still very sharp after 3 years of use
customer_reviews.text: I have this peeler for almost 3 years now and it is still very sharp. I requested to return the item because of the price but Amazon refunded and ask me to keep it. I used it almost every day and worth to come back and share my experience. I like the way that blade grip to the object during the job. The thing I love about it is I am a lefty and it is very ergonomic to my hand. I wish they could provide a better cover for the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Ehsan Norouzi

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy; plastic eye remover has bits of plastic that will break off
customer_reviews.text: I am sending this back without even removing it from its cardboard holder. It is very very heavy, particularly for someone with hand or wrist arthritis. The eye remover is plastic and is not smooth; I'm sure bits of plastic would break off into the potato. This does not seem to be the usual "Good Grips" quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tsippi

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my mother-in-law because her peeler was old, dull, and difficult to use. I've had good experiences with OXO products so I got her this one and liked it so much, I bought one for myself later. Peeling potatoes with her is comical because she still has her old peeler and whoever ends up with that one peels one potato for every 3-4 potatoes the other person does with the OXO peeler. I love OXO products, every one I've bought has been my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Miller

customer_reviews.title: Like a hot knife through butter
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a lot of different peelers, but this is the only one I really like. It’s easy to hold, fits in my hand, can be used for long periods without causing hand cramps or tiredness, cuts through peels easily and cleanly, and works just as well peeling towards me as away from me. With potatoes and apples, I prefer to pull the peeler towards my thumb, and with many peelers I’ve found the shape of them means they often nick or cut my thumb. Not this one.
customer_reviews.author: KDA

customer_reviews.title: No frills, but works great!
customer_reviews.text: Have RA and these peelers are so much nicer than the thinner handle, or handle without grip, items. Less expensive here than some chain stores and with the holidays can’t hurt to have more potatoe peelers. Remember, this is a basic peeler. If you want something that peels, does fancy slices, etc...this isn’t what you want. If you want to peel and get on to next job...without having the peeler fall out of your hand...this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Spady

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better protective cover. Cuts very well
customer_reviews.text: nice handy peeler. The blade comes sharp and peels with ease. The grip is fairly comfortable. But i noticed sometimes food gets into the handle and i have a hard time getting it out. I would recommend a better protective covering for the blade. The cover falls off easily when in my draw and it would be easy to have an accident if not very careful.
customer_reviews.author: Joon yi

customer_reviews.title: I Bought Two !
customer_reviews.text: Yep, bought two, one for the kitchen and one for the travel trailer. These are great. Replacing a broken one after having it for about 10 years. Easy, squeezy on can opening, does not take a bunch of hand strength compared to a "pliers" type of can opener and another benefit is the smooth lid and can, not having a sharp edge. Easy to clean in dishwasher if need be. Two thumbs up on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Makes peeling vegetables very easy
customer_reviews.text: This peeler is excellent quality; very sharp and very comfortable. Not sure if you have very small hands it would be so easy to grip, but I find it very comfortable and secure. Because it swivels the blade is always at a good cutting angle and the design means that running a knife sharpener across the back is all that is needed to keep it sharp. Great product! I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Philip T.

customer_reviews.title: I know just a peeler, but this thing works
customer_reviews.text: Ok, after several months of constant use I am writing my review. I know this is just a peeler, but we use one and have worn out several in our household. This one is good for daily use and has not failed us. I waited a few months to make sure it actually held up which it has. This worked so well I ordered another one as I was tired of having it in the dishwasher we use a peeler so much. Worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: TravelinLight

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp!! Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: I have always peeled potatoes with a knife and didn’t realize just how beneficial a potatoe peeler was lol I’m also 28 so thank god I found out sooner than later. I may be bused because it’s my first peeler but it feels quality made and is VERYV VERY sharp. I actual shave some skin off by accident..not enough to draw blood because I wasn’t applying that much pressure but still.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Irreplaceable!
customer_reviews.text: My oxo peeler went missing and I didn’t even consider replacing it with another brand! This is the greatest peeler. It even handles butternut squash like a charm. Yes, $10 is a lot for a peeler but it’s worth it to have a quality kitchen device.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Miller

customer_reviews.title: Sharpest and fastest peeler I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This thing arrived at my doorstep yesterday. The wife asked me to make potato soup. With my old peeler it would take me about 15 minutes to peel the 6 potatoes necessary. After giving the new peeler a quick wash I started peeling. It's so sharp that each stroke leaves a shiny potato surface. Never seen anything like it. I had them done in under 5 minutes. One of the best purchases I've ever made from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: CoderGuy

customer_reviews.title: A simple and perfect little kitchen tool.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a classic and simple design for a vegetable peeler. The edges stay sharp and the blades swivel slightly to move over the object to be peeled. I make limoncello every year and it is important to have all the pith removes from the lemon peels to avoid bitterness in the finished product. I use this tool and have very little scraping. It cuts wide strips and is very easy to maneuver! I can see no reason to use any other product.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Hopper

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these for years and cannot imagine using an all metal one. The combination of large, non-slip grip and swiveling peeler give me everything I want and value in a peeler. OXO makes great products. I really like using their can opener I've had for a long time too.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaC

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I'm writing a review for a peeler but this is a great little item. My old favorite peeler must have jumped in the trash so I needed a replacement. This thing is super sharp so it actually has me a little cautious when using it. It also peels a very thin layer which is great when peeling something like a mango. It is just the right size so it doesn't slip out of your hands when peeling something slippery, again like a mango. I personally hate peeling mangoes so this thing is in my eyes a gem!
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great peeler! with great grip! Amazing for people that may have arthritis
customer_reviews.text: This is a great peeler that's easy and comfortable to hold. I always used this Swedish peeler, I forget the name, but williams sonoma sells them in 3 packs, but they had a plastic blade holder that always broke. I have had this peeler for several years with no sign of wear. I bought this one for my mom recently and she loves it too! It's a nice smooth peeler and is easy to clean and maintain. Hoping for many more years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Sharp vegetable peeler!
customer_reviews.text: I read good reviews about this OXO peeler being sharp, which is what I was looking for. It is an excellent vegetable peeler. It is sharp and comfortable to use. It even comes with a blade protector so you won't accidently cut yourself when it is in your drawer. I highly recommend this peeler!
customer_reviews.author: Palm tree

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tools
customer_reviews.text: They make good quality products for home kitchen use and are generally very affordable. Many times these products are superior to commercial grade equipment and the peeler is no exception. good buy, nice gift for housewarming or even a dinner party package.
customer_reviews.author: M Mayhem

customer_reviews.title: Best peeler I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This OXO fits my hand like it was made for me. It is easy to grip and doesn't slip, but the best part is how sharp it is. I have given these as gifts to friends that complain about their peelers or when I see that what they are using doesn't work near as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: doesn't peel very deep
customer_reviews.text: I really like OXO products in general, but this peeler is one of their less effective kitchen tools. The grip is nice to hold, but the peeler itself is quite weak - it doesn't cut very deep and thus I have to go over vegetables multiple times to get the right amount of peel off.
customer_reviews.author: d808Top Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Best Peeler I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the BEST peeler I have ever used. You just barely press down while peeling carrots, potatoes, etc.... and it glides smoothly and peels. It’s light weight and easy to grip. I am going to purchase another one because I am so impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Best. Peeler. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only peeler I'll ever trust. The handle is comfortable in my hand. The blades are sharp in both directions, so that whether you peel away or towards yourself, you're in good shape. The actual blade thing swivels just enough that it will conform to the thing you're peeling, but not so much as to feel loose in your hand. Mind you, I like this particular shape of peeler much more than the Y-shaped peeler, so I am a bit biased in this direction. AND, the blade can be replaced.. If you want to spend less than what they're charging here on Amazon, it's $5 from Oxo's website.
customer_reviews.author: Dinakar Sarma

customer_reviews.title: Hands Down - The Best Peeler I Have EVER Used!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about people cutting their fingers but that's like complaining that your knife is too sharp. Still I was a bit wary at first. After my first carrot I am wary no more. This thing works great. So well in fact we are thinking of giving them away as a Christmas stocking stuffer.s Highly, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rjv

customer_reviews.title: I love OXO and this peeler's blade is such a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The OXO features that make it easy to hold etc are great, but this peeler is not sharp!! My old OXO peeler had started to get dull so bought this new version. Oh my, it is more dull than the old one!
customer_reviews.author: Belle Varney

customer_reviews.title: I Love My Oxo Peeler
customer_reviews.text: A few weeks ago, someone stole my Oxo peeler... I've looked everywhere. I think it's the same person who hides my glasses and the remote control! I immediately had to order another one which I am now guarding with my life. This is a great peeler, sharp and peels carrots in seconds as well as everything else.
customer_reviews.author: CANTHESPAM

customer_reviews.title: Best Peeler Ever
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this peeler for me 8 years ago for Christmas because I said I needed a good one and he did his research and bought me this magic wand. I love it. He was made fun of for buying it for me for our first Christmas after getting married but it is seriously one of my best kitchen tools. When I was helping my mom peel potatoes on Thanksgiving and saw her sorry excuse for a peeled I knew exactly what her stocking needed this Christmas.. she loves it now too.
customer_reviews.author: DeirdreHughesCollins

customer_reviews.title: Great peeler, take your time
customer_reviews.text: This peeler works so well, just used it on carrots for dinner last night. It is comfortable to hold and slides so smoothly. Because it slides so smoothly I can tell that the reviews saying how sharp it is must be true so I just made sure to take my time and not rush. I held the end of the carrot and started peeling about halfway down and then I would flip the carrot, holding the peeled end, and peel the other end; that way the blade was never too close to my hand. I'm really glad I purchased this, made dinner prep so much easier, quicker than when I was just using a knife to crudely peel.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: how did i do it before
customer_reviews.text: the cut is so smooth and clean. i will be taking care of this one. if i had any complaint it would be that the peeler is so good that i almost expect the blade to be removable for easy cleaning instead of putting my fat fingers in there. this is not an issue of any real value. cuts like a premium cutter.
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: Great VERY SHARP Peeler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my 15-20 year old potato peeler, and used it for the first time this weekend. Highly recommend - very sharp, cuts easily through anything including your fingers so be careful. If you're looking to replace an old peeler like I was....be cautious. :) It's much sharper than my old one and I somewhat regret using it. I'm sure my finger will heal in time and I'll be more careful next time lol.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: OXO succeeds again
customer_reviews.text: I love OXO products, so when my sister needed a new peeler cuz her old one got dull I got her this. Nice and sharp, easy to use, and there’s a little device at the top to help dig out the potato eyes or whatever you call em! Seriously though, you just can’t go wrong with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Opened up a whole new world!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really? Who could get fired up over a potato peeler? Me! Dang, I've missed out for a long time. This thing is smooth as glass. I have two rebuilt thumbs and it's comfortable. My wife needs her thumbs rebuilt but can still use it. Hard to explain but this is a great peeler. Do yourself a favor. Even if your hands work just fine. This baby will improve your cooking experience.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Thin peels, sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Love this peeler! I cook a lot, big family. I'm so glad I made this purchase. It only takes off a little, doesn't snag, peels in either direction. It's going to save me so much lost produce with the way it takes off so little and peels so much faster than any peeler I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Best Peeler Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a number of different peelers thinking they’ll make the task of peeling potatoes easier or faster but none of them have lived up to the OXO peeler. Easy to hold and sharp. Don’t get me wrong. Peeling potatoes is still not an exciting task but the OXO will get it done quicker!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Best Peeler Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this peeler when I received a huge bunch of apples from a co-worker and wanted to make apple butter. I had previously purchased an electric apple peeler but because some of the apples were quite small, I decided it would be easier to peel them by hand. This is by far the best peeler I have ever used - it peeled the apples so fast and clean. I've also used it on cucumbers and potatoes and was equally impressed. Time will tell about its durability but so far it is definitely an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Mysticlin

customer_reviews.title: sharpest peeler out there
customer_reviews.text: This peeler is amazing. So amazing in fact that instead of just removing potato peels it removed the tip of my left middle finger. Fortunately, the urgent care near me was still open (it was Christmas Day), so I was able to get my bloody finger closed up and bandaged for the low price of a $50 co-pay. That trip mean my husband had to finish peeling potatoes, cook the rest of Christmas dinner and then do all of the dishes while I sat on the couch sipping wine while keeping my hand elevated. I highly recommend this peeler, but you might want to buy a mesh glove to use with it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Meade

customer_reviews.title: This peeler is very stable in the hands and peels like a dream
customer_reviews.text: I liked the feel of it in my hand as the blade melts through the skins of potatoes and carrots. It's stability in my hand (even when wet) is remarkable. It's the best peeler I have ever owned. By the way, it is very sharp, so be cautious.
customer_reviews.author: W. R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: sharp!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sharp peeler, beware! My first one dulled very quickly, but OXO was quick to replace it and the new one is doing great, really nice to use. Super smooth and sharp. I like it for peeling rhubarb, asparagus, carrots and yams. Slips through soft veg like zucchini and cukes like butter. I recommenced this peeler.
customer_reviews.author: at home in the Poconos

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Actually made peeling potatoes fun. Such a smooth peeler, barely put any effort into it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Best peeler I have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Best peeler I have ever had. My pet-peeve with this kind of peelers is usually the grip. The second problem is often sharpness. This particular peeler offers a superior grip that allows more pressure on the potato, carrot, whatever you are peeling. The blades are extremely sharp. It even peeled flawlessly eggplants - a challenge. Dishwasher friendly. You probably will like it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you are into peeling! ;)
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't think that I should invest in a peeler lol I got mine at a dollar store and never thought about it twice. Now I have a kid and I'm peeling carrots, apples, potatoes...you name it! Constantly! And this new peeler makes a huge difference! So if you are into peeling, buy this!😆
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: No joke, this thing is sharp. Take your time using it because it will absolutely slice your finger without trying (ask me how I know). Great peeler otherwise. Certainly gets the job done and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor potato peeler.
customer_reviews.text: The cutting blade wobbles too much for a good cut. I have to push down very hard to keep it steady. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: One of the best peelers.
customer_reviews.text: Oxo makes the most well-designed kitchen gadgets and this peeler is no exception. I’ve bought several of this peelers already. It grips nicely and comfortably and peels super well for both forward or reverse direction. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Nhat Le

customer_reviews.title: Didn't realize that I had my first one for more than 5 years!
customer_reviews.text: Ok,, I want to get a second of this for travel. When I looked back my first order, it was bought in 2012. We use it everyday on vegi and fruit. never see any degradation on the peeling quality. I am surprised this thing is going strong after such a long use. It is very comfortable to hold and peels great. Will order my second one without a blink.
customer_reviews.author: VL

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wow, i finally retired my old peeler - had it for about 20 years. this one has a swivel handle and is so much sharper and easier to use. Couldn't believe how cheap it was. Wish i had retired the old one a long time ago
customer_reviews.author: richm

customer_reviews.title: Up to snuff
customer_reviews.text: I find this product to be the best inexpensively-priced peeler on the market. It has met all my "bachelor" requirements of utility, value and no-frills clean-up. A peeler is not rocket-science, but some thought has gone into this design. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: William Wisner

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the super cheap all metal peelers my entire life, so not sure I can give a knowledgeable review, but this thing is comfortable, easy to use, and very sharp. It cuts my peeling time down by at least a third! The crazy thing is, it was only a couple of dollars more than the "cheap," ones I'd been getting!
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: THIS is THE veg peeler you need
customer_reviews.text: What a delight- easy to use, easy to grip. The blade swivels like Elvis, and that is a good thing. Made zippy work of piles of veg, night after night. Potato eye remover on tip quite good as well. How much do I like this lil worker bee? Taking it with me for the holidays, as we will be cooking at various family homes (shhh- they are all going to get one of these!), and no-one has upgraded their utensil game since the late 50s. What a simple delight- a tool that performs perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: stratford hall

customer_reviews.title: Everybody needs a new peeler
customer_reviews.text: How many people do I know who have not replaced their vegetable peeler since they got married, ten, fifteen, thirty years ago? Buy a new one! This handle is easy to hold. You will be glad
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I had an older model and liked it so much I got the newer model. After about 20 years, the plastic on the older model cracked. so the blade would spin. The newer model peals great and is easy to hold. I really like OXO products in general.
customer_reviews.author: FatMilkDud

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a knife to peel potatoes and thought this would make it easier. It’s clunky and I severely cut myself on first use. I never cut myself with a knife. It is plenty sharp, difficult to hold without putting yourself at risk.
customer_reviews.author: C. Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Comfy to Hold
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I’d review a vegetable peeler. However, this one is great It’s substantial to hold A perfect size Sharron I’m sure it will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Bon

customer_reviews.title: super sharp.  peels stuff with ease..
customer_reviews.text: im not sure how you use the eye remover tool, im not even seeing anything to remove the eyes built into this thing.. ill have to try to figure out how its made to be used as far as that goes but great for pealing stuff and comfy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: daniel  caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Not very sharp. Not precise.
customer_reviews.text: Not as sharp or precise as some other brands of peelers. I like the Jonas brand better because you can peel potatoes faster and it cuts into the potato skin with more precision.
customer_reviews.author: rabbit rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Super fast and easy on to hold with wet hands
customer_reviews.text: Whether you're peeling a mountain of potatoes, carrots or cucumber this tool is my preferred peeler. I own 3 because it's that indispensable. So for computing its value to me, it's crazy cheap and a simple investment that lasts for years. expect these to last 3-25 years depending on frequency of usage.
customer_reviews.author: kgmc1983

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for pealing potatoes, apples, carrots etc. , but the blades are not as sharp as the one I've been using for the last 20 years. Will just take a little getting used to. I like that the handle is all durable molded plastic, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Love this simple appliance
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased my second one of these. The first one lasted years, then suddenly vanished. Strong enough for daily use. Use on carrots and potatoes. Couldn't be happier with this.
customer_reviews.author: business person

customer_reviews.title: Love this gadget!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these I've owned, because they don't get returned to me when they get borrowed! At the price, though, I don't mind, I just get another one. There's an excellent little dimple on the peeler end that's perfect for removing the eyes off potatoes, the blade stays sharp, well, forever, since I've never been able to keep one til it wears out, and I think that out of all the different styles of peelers I've used over the years, this one is the best. It's what I expect from OXO, they've never let me down so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marriott

customer_reviews.title: Great Peeler!
customer_reviews.text: Great Peeler! Super sharp and great grip. I don't know why the other reviews show cut fingers and nails... I cook every other day and used the peeler a lot and I have never cut myself....
customer_reviews.author: Hugo M.

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomically designed for comfort and effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: OXO is a really good brand. All their products including this one are designed well to be a useful kitchen tool. We needed one, but we bought two so that if there were extra hands in the kitchen we could get more done faster.
customer_reviews.author: lpa

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this peeler!! The hand grip on it is awesome and super comfortable. My husband did however take the top of his finger off when he first used it 😂 it is very very sharp so it’s a good idea to keep it up and out of little ones reach.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Marie

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't too sure I'd like it
customer_reviews.text: but I do! I had a peeler I really really liked and somehow I've lost it. None of the others I've tried worked well....they'd slip and hurt me or didn't peel well. This works much better than anything I've seen recently.
customer_reviews.author: M. Agloro

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and Easy
customer_reviews.text: We love our oxo products and this is no exception. It is so sharp and cuts through vegetable and fruit skin. We definitely recommend this peeler.
customer_reviews.author: EEman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold and use, amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I already had a WMF peeler at home for peeling vegetables, I bought this one for peeling fruit separately, it is easy to hold and use, can even peeling soft peach smoothly, that was amazing, the only thing you need to know is that it is very sharp, take care of your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Tianna

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier
customer_reviews.text: I have used the peeler for peeling the skin from cucumber and ofcourse potatoes. I love it. Doesn't peel too thick that you have to go over that surface again. One swipe and its good. Need to get one for my Mum and sister.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a simple and functional peeler.
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a vegetable peeler that works. It may sound silly unless you have tried to replace a peeler you liked. There are so many terrible peelers out there, it is confusing, how can such a simple device be so poorly designed by so many? Thank you for keeping simple and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Getchell

customer_reviews.title: Great peeler
customer_reviews.text: Not just a cheap metal peeler. You don't realize how dull your peeler is until you get a new one. Its extremely sharp and much easier to hold on to than the all metal ones. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Taylor underdahl

customer_reviews.title: my go to peeler
customer_reviews.text: I love this peeler- does a great job. ive had a few of these for a long time, they work extremely well and are never awkward to hold like so many other peelers. top of the line in my book.
customer_reviews.author: mike higgins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality tool
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent peeler. I much prefer it to Y style peelers because there is more control with the swivel design. Beyond just peeling, this is a great way to make large flat veggie noodles or ribbons of veggies for salad.
customer_reviews.author: Selene B

customer_reviews.title: Be careful! Super sharp!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting the peeler to be so sharp and I peeled part of my thumb nail and the skin underneath right off! Yikes! Be careful with this peeler. Otherwise it works really well, but I’m not sure why it needs to be so sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Hasegawa-Ahrendt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like this one, and i have been using only this one because it is easy to use and clean, and it is sharp. Thank you for your outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I literally started peeling a carrot to test it out within 15 seconds of opening it. It works as advertised and as many people claim. It works PERFECTLY. It really does.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Raburn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great peeler. The peeler includes a small plastic cover for the blade portion that can be reused which is a huge bonus. I like to keep my things in good condition and with the plastic blade cover i don't have to worry about damage to the blade over time from rolling around in a kitchen drawer.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found... I peel a lot of veggies.
customer_reviews.text: This is my preferred peeler. Angle and sharpness of blade works perfectly for me. This peeler fits my hand comfortably. My hands are medium sized female.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to peel sweet potatoes for a dinner party, and it was soooooo easy to do with this product. I had them peeled in a very short period of time with no effort. This is a must for every kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Foxco

customer_reviews.title: Our 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: Still using the one we bought a few years ago. Bought a second one for camping as my hand has gotten used to the product. No point reinventing what has worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Tamic

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad peeler.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad peeler. The rubber handle is easy to grip. I do feel like I need to apply a bit more pressure with this one than my old one but still in excellent daily peeler with no chance of cutting yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

product_meta.title: OXO Good Grips Swivel Peeler
product_meta.description:
The OXO Good Grips Swivel Peeler is perfect for prepping tough-skinned fruits and vegetables. Twin stainless steel blades flex to remove large swaths of skin with each stroke. The comfortable, oversized handle was designed for fast, repetitive use and won’t slip, even when wet. A durable, built-in eye remover carves out blemishes without ruining your produce. The Peeler is dishwasher safe and includes a large in-handle hole for simple storage.

AMAZON.COM
Whether peeling a Granny Smith apple or a fruit with an even tougher skin, the swivel peeler by Oxo is an essential tool in any kitchen. Its flexible, rotating stainless-steel blades make peeling simple by contouring to almost any surface shape. The built-in potato eye remover is durable and can easily carve out blemishes without digging. 

The Good Grips line features durable, nonslip, flexible handles on every product. Ergonomically designed to fit the palm comfortably and softly, the pressure-absorbing processed rubber handle puts less tension on the hands while still providing an outstanding grip. Made from the same material as dishwasher gaskets, the handles are slip-proof--wet or dry--as well as dishwasher-safe. Good Grips products are moderately priced and have won the Tylenol/Arthritis Foundation Design Award. --Laurie Notaro
feature_bullets: Swiveling twin blades with flexible action easily peel potatoes, apples and other tough skinned fruits and vegetables
Soft, oversized handle designed for repetitive strokes
Comfortable non slip grip, even when wet
Large hole in handle for easy storage

The OXO Better Guarantee: If you experience an issue with your OXO product, get in touch with us for a repair or replacement. We’re grateful for the opportunity to learn from your experience, and we’ll make it better

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars11,704 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
